name: Vehicles and Cars Coloring Kid
description:
Your kid loves every kind of cars and vehicles ?
Your toddler is a little artist ? you have found the right educational game !

This app is simple and fun :
choose color to use, the brush size and be creative !
This app encourage your toddler's creativity and imagination.

Four categories with beautiful vehicles to color and to hear:
- Land vehicles
- Air vehicles
- Construction vehicles
- Sea vehicles

More than 100 coloring pages in the unlocked version: buggy, tank, quad, hovercraft, submarine, canoe, airboat, asphalt roller, hang glider, blimp,
jumbo jet, hot air balloon, spaceship, bus, excavator, truck, fire truck, tractor, motorcycle, airplane, police car, taxi , helicopter, truck lift, van, forklift, bike, ambulance, race car !

If your kid loves trucks he can find dozer, cranes, digger, Earth mover, Loader Excavator Bulldozer, telescopic crane, bobcat and other!
If your little one wants to sail the seas will color pirate ship, speedboat, sailboat, yacht, galleon, aircraft carrier, rowing boat, watercraft, jetsky, motorboat, Viking Ship and other ships and boats!
If your child wants to be an aviator can color every kind of plane and jet !

Amazing sound effects for each vehicle!
A stunning collection of coloring pages with this free cars coloring pages !

if your toddler loves painting, coloring and sketching, this is the best coloring app for your child.

Vehicles and cars coloring pages for toddlers and kids is a must have app for little artists. Features:
-game for toddlers and kids from ages 0-10 years old
-Optimized for tablets (Sony , Samsung, Kindle)
-entertaining and educational game
-easy to use for children and preschoolers, babies, little boys and little girls
-simple and intuitive : just a few commands to use
-a lot of finger painting fun with cars coloring games
-exercise your toddler fine motor skills
-high quality vehicles coloring pages
-Save the best colored drawings and share them with whoever you want
-the best coloring book to color , paint and draw toy cars and trucks !

Help your kids to learn the coloring and painting techniques, inspire your toddler's creativity and imagination!

In this free game for toddlers you can unlock all coloring pages and remove the advertising in app.

Happy colouring by BATOKI ! Best Apps for TOddlers and KIds
developers: BATOKI - Best Apps for Toddlers and Kids
